components.name: Layout
components.description: Root layout component with RTL support, metadata, and global styles for the law firm website

components.name: Navbar
components.description: RTL-optimized navigation bar for a Hebrew law firm with logo, navigation links to page sections, and contact button

components.name: HeroSection
components.description: Bold, RTL hero section for a Hebrew law firm with headline, subheadline, and call-to-action

components.name: AboutSection
components.description: RTL-optimized about section highlighting the law firm's expertise, experience and values

components.name: ServicesSection
components.description: Comprehensive RTL services section showcasing the law firm's legal expertise areas

components.name: TeamSection
components.description: RTL-optimized team section showcasing the law firm's attorneys with their expertise and credentials

components.name: PortfolioSection
components.description: RTL-optimized case studies section showcasing the law firm's successful legal cases

components.name: TestimonialsSection
components.description: RTL-optimized testimonials carousel showcasing client feedback for the law firm

components.name: ContactSection
components.description: RTL-optimized contact section with form, map, and contact details for the law firm

components.name: Footer
components.description: RTL-optimized footer with copyright, links, and social media for the law firm

components.name: Button
components.description: Reusable RTL-friendly button component with variants for the law firm website

components.name: Card
components.description: Reusable RTL-friendly card component for displaying content on the law firm website

components.name: SectionHeader
components.description: Reusable RTL-friendly section header component with title and subtitle for the law firm website
